CustomField.description: Running total of days from Census and Payroll Instructions Sent to Census & Eligibility Uploaded. Stops counting once Census and Eligibility Uploaded date is entered.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c), 0-0,
(IF( Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c < Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c ,
(IF(ISNULL(Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c), TODAY()- Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c, Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c - Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c)),
(IF(ISNULL(Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c), MAX((TODAY()- Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c) ,0), Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c - Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c )) )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Running total of days from Census and Payroll Instructions Sent to Census & Eligibility Uploaded. Stops counting once Census and Eligibility Uploaded date is entered.
CustomField.label: Time to Census KPI
